item.description: Number of Data Breaches is not a Good Security Metric Ok, of course it’s not. Does this feel familiar though? Budget gets allocated to cybersecurity Cybersecurity activities happen Everyone is reasonably happy, except the application delivery teams having cybersecurity activities done to them Terrible news - a data breach! Panic Budget gets substantially increased for cybersecurity Substantially more cybersecurity activities happen Everyone is reasonably happy, except the application delivery teams having substantially more cybersecurity activities done to them
